title: How to Move to a Big City With Your Best Friend

steps.headline: Find a friend that you know and trust and you want to make this big change with!
steps.description: Make sure they are trustworthy and won't destroy or steal your valuables!

steps.headline: Decide on the City together!
steps.description: Make sure it is one that the both of you enjoy and will be happy with in the long run.

steps.headline: Search for your apartment!
steps.description: Make sure you both have your own bedroom because would you two really want to share a bunk-bed? No, I didn't think so.

steps.headline: Also, you and your BFF might want your own bathroom so you would have to fight over the shower in the morning or get angry and complain about your BFF using you NEW EXPENSIVE SHAMPOO!
Make you both know where the "common" and "private" areas in your apartment!
When going shopping together make sure you both agree on the furniture for the "common areas" such as living room, dining room, kitchen and balcony.
When deciding to decorate you own bedroom GO CRAZY!
steps.description: It's yours! You could even put Jonas Brothers, or Justin Bieber sheets on your bed!

steps.headline: Make sure you and your BFF have a meeting every night and talk about the IMPORTANT things in life like the cute boys you keep seeing in the city!
Make sure your roommate won't get mad at you if you decide to BLAST Jonas Brothers on the radio, if they don't like it turn it off and to have a dance party in your room.

Since you and your BFF will see each other a lot in your new apartment and might not go out together as much, make sure you have a girls night out and go party it up at a club or go shopping or out for lunch or dinner!
If you or your friend have a boyfriend(s) make sure if the other friend HATES them don't invite them over!
Make sure to give you BFF some space!
steps.description: if she goes to her room and shuts the door don't go and knock on it every five seconds or jump on her bed when she is sleeping...she might get angry!

steps.headline: Make sure you and you BFF do your separate grocery shopping and get coloured stickers from the dollar store to put on your own food!
steps.description: Also you might want to use half of the fridge and your BFF use the other!

steps.headline: Make sure when doing the chores you each clean your own room and bathroom!
steps.description: For the shared areas make a list of who will clean what during the week!

steps.headline: Make sure when your BFF goes to sleep you turn off your loud annoying music and turn the volume of tv down

If you BFF says she is going to spend the night at her boyfriends house don't go A-wall on her and give her a hard time for leaving you alone, enjoy the peace and do whatever you want, hey, go through her stuff if you want, just make sure to put it all back!
Make sure you enjoys your years together and try to have fun!

text: Find a friend that you know and trust and you want to make this big change with! Make sure they are trustworthy and won't destroy or steal your valuables! Decide on the City together! Make sure it is one that the both of you enjoy and will be happy with in the long run. Search for your apartment! Make sure you both have your own bedroom because would you two really want to share a bunk-bed? No, I didn't think so. Also, you and your BFF might want your own bathroom so you would have to fight over the shower in the morning or get angry and complain about your BFF using you NEW EXPENSIVE SHAMPOO!  Make you both know where the "common" and "private" areas in your apartment!  When going shopping together make sure you both agree on the furniture for the "common areas" such as living room, dining room, kitchen and balcony.  When deciding to decorate you own bedroom GO CRAZY! It's yours! You could even put Jonas Brothers, or Justin Bieber sheets on your bed! Make sure you and your BFF have a meeting every night and talk about the IMPORTANT things in life like the cute boys you keep seeing in the city!  Make sure your roommate won't get mad at you if you decide to BLAST Jonas Brothers on the radio, if they don't like it turn it off and to have a dance party in your room.  Since you and your BFF will see each other a lot in your new apartment and might not go out together as much, make sure you have a girls night out and go party it up at a club or go shopping or out for lunch or dinner!  If you or your friend have a boyfriend(s) make sure if the other friend HATES them don't invite them over!  Make sure to give you BFF some space! if she goes to her room and shuts the door don't go and knock on it every five seconds or jump on her bed when she is sleeping...she might get angry! Make sure you and you BFF do your separate grocery shopping and get coloured stickers from the dollar store to put on your own food! Also you might want to use half of the fridge and your BFF use the other! Make sure when doing the chores you each clean your own room and bathroom! For the shared areas make a list of who will clean what during the week! Make sure when your BFF goes to sleep you turn off your loud annoying music and turn the volume of tv down  If you BFF says she is going to spend the night at her boyfriends house don't go A-wall on her and give her a hard time for leaving you alone, enjoy the peace and do whatever you want, hey, go through her stuff if you want, just make sure to put it all back!  Make sure you enjoys your years together and try to have fun!
